Package org.schabi.newpipe.extractor.services.youtube.dashmanifestcreators

Class YoutubeDashManifestCreatorsUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.schabi.newpipe.extractor.services.youtube.dashmanifestcreators.YoutubeDashManifestCreatorsUtils
  • public final class YoutubeDashManifestCreatorsUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities and constants for YouTube DASH manifest creators.

    This class includes common methods of manifest creators and useful constants.

    Generation of DASH documents and their conversion as a string is done using external classes from org.w3c.dom and javax.xml packages.

      • ALR_YES

        public static final java.lang.String ALR_YES
        URL parameter specific to web clients. When this param is added, if a redirection occurs, the server will not redirect clients to the redirect URL. Instead, it will provide this URL as the response body.
        See Also:

                                org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String value)
        Create an attribute with Document.createAttribute(String), assign to it the provided name and value, then add it to the provided element using Element.setAttributeNode(Attr).
        Parameters:
        element - element to which to add the created node
        doc - document to use to create the attribute
        name - name of the attribute
        value - value of the attribute, will be set using Attr.setValue(String)

      • generateDocumentAndDoCommonElementsGeneration

        @Nonnull
public static org.w3c.dom.Document generateDocumentAndDoCommonElementsGeneration​(@Nonnull
                                                                                 ItagItem itagItem,
                                                                                 long streamDuration)
                                                                          throws CreationException
        Generate a Document with common manifest creator elements added to it.
        Those are:
        • MPD (using generateDocumentAndMpdElement(long));
        • Period (using generatePeriodElement(Document));
        • AdaptationSet (using generateAdaptationSetElement(Document, ItagItem));
        • Role (using generateRoleElement(Document, ItagItem));
        • Representation (using generateRepresentationElement(Document, ItagItem));
        • and, for audio streams, AudioChannelConfiguration (using generateAudioChannelConfigurationElement(Document, ItagItem)).
        Parameters:
        itagItem - the ItagItem associated to the stream, which must not be null
        streamDuration - the duration of the stream, in milliseconds
        Returns:
        a Document with the common elements added in it
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • generateDocumentAndMpdElement

        @Nonnull
public static org.w3c.dom.Document generateDocumentAndMpdElement​(long duration)
                                                          throws CreationException
        Create a Document instance and generate the <MPD> element of the manifest.

        The generated <MPD> element looks like the manifest returned into the player response of videos:

        <MPD xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:mpeg:DASH:schema:MPD:2011" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:mpeg:DASH:schema:MPD:2011 DASH-MPD.xsd" minBufferTime="PT1.500S" profiles="urn:mpeg:dash:profile:isoff-main:2011" type="static" mediaPresentationDuration="PT$duration$S"> (where $duration$ represents the duration in seconds (a number with 3 digits after the decimal point)).

        Parameters:
        duration - the duration of the stream, in milliseconds
        Returns:
        a Document instance which contains a <MPD> element
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • generatePeriodElement

        public static void generatePeriodElement​(@Nonnull
                                         org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                  throws CreationException
        Generate the <Period> element, appended as a child of the <MPD> element.

        The <MPD> element needs to be generated before this element with generateDocumentAndMpdElement(long).

        Parameters:
        doc - the Document on which the <Period> element will be appended
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • generateAdaptationSetElement

        public static void generateAdaptationSetElement​(@Nonnull
                                                org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                @Nonnull
                                                ItagItem itagItem)
                                         throws CreationException
        Generate the <AdaptationSet> element, appended as a child of the <Period> element.

        The <Period> element needs to be generated before this element with generatePeriodElement(Document).

        Parameters:
        doc - the Document on which the <Period> element will be appended
        itagItem - the ItagItem corresponding to the stream, which must not be null
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • generateRoleElement

        public static void generateRoleElement​(@Nonnull
                                       org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       ItagItem itagItem)
                                throws CreationException
        Generate the <Role> element, appended as a child of the <AdaptationSet> element.

        This element, with its attributes and values, is:

        <Role schemeIdUri="urn:mpeg:DASH:role:2011" value="VALUE"/>, where VALUE is main for videos and audios, description for descriptive audio and dub for dubbed audio.

        The <AdaptationSet> element needs to be generated before this element with generateAdaptationSetElement(Document, ItagItem)).

        Parameters:
        doc - the Document on which the <Role> element will be appended
        itagItem - the ItagItem corresponding to the stream, which must not be null
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • generateRepresentationElement

        public static void generateRepresentationElement​(@Nonnull
                                                 org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                 @Nonnull
                                                 ItagItem itagItem)
                                          throws CreationException
        Generate the <Representation> element, appended as a child of the <AdaptationSet> element.

        The <AdaptationSet> element needs to be generated before this element with generateAdaptationSetElement(Document, ItagItem)).

        Parameters:
        doc - the Document on which the <SegmentTimeline> element will be appended
        itagItem - the ItagItem to use, which must not be null
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • generateAudioChannelConfigurationElement

        public static void generateAudioChannelConfigurationElement​(@Nonnull
                                                            org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                            @Nonnull
                                                            ItagItem itagItem)
                                                     throws CreationException
        Generate the <AudioChannelConfiguration> element, appended as a child of the <Representation> element.

        This method is only used when generating DASH manifests of audio streams.

        It will produce the following element:
        <AudioChannelConfiguration schemeIdUri="urn:mpeg:dash:23003:3:audio_channel_configuration:2011" value="audioChannelsValue"
        (where audioChannelsValue is get from the ItagItem passed as the second parameter of this method)

        The <Representation> element needs to be generated before this element with generateRepresentationElement(Document, ItagItem)).

        Parameters:
        doc - the Document on which the <AudioChannelConfiguration> element will be appended
        itagItem - the ItagItem to use, which must not be null
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • buildAndCacheResult

        public static java.lang.String buildAndCacheResult​(@Nonnull
                                                   java.lang.String originalBaseStreamingUrl,
                                                   @Nonnull
                                                   org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                   @Nonnull
                                                   ManifestCreatorCache<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> manifestCreatorCache)
                                            throws CreationException
        Convert a DASH manifest doc to a string and cache it.
        Parameters:
        originalBaseStreamingUrl - the original base URL of the stream
        doc - the doc to be converted
        manifestCreatorCache - the ManifestCreatorCache on which store the string generated
        Returns:
        the DASH manifest doc converted to a string
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • generateSegmentTemplateElement

        public static void generateSegmentTemplateElement​(@Nonnull
                                                  org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                  @Nonnull
                                                  java.lang.String baseUrl,
                                                  DeliveryType deliveryType)
                                           throws CreationException
        Generate the <SegmentTemplate> element, appended as a child of the <Representation> element.

        This method is only used when generating DASH manifests from OTF and post-live-DVR streams.

        It will produce a <SegmentTemplate> element with the following attributes:
        • startNumber, which takes the value 0 for post-live-DVR streams and 1 for OTF streams;
        • timescale, which is always 1000;
        • media, which is the base URL of the stream on which is appended &sq=$Number$;
        • initialization (only for OTF streams), which is the base URL of the stream on which is appended SQ_0.

        The <Representation> element needs to be generated before this element with generateRepresentationElement(Document, ItagItem)).

        Parameters:
        doc - the Document on which the <SegmentTemplate> element will be appended
        baseUrl - the base URL of the OTF/post-live-DVR stream
        deliveryType - the stream delivery type, which must be either OTF or LIVE
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • generateSegmentTimelineElement

        public static void generateSegmentTimelineElement​(@Nonnull
                                                  org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                           throws CreationException
        Generate the <SegmentTimeline> element, appended as a child of the <SegmentTemplate> element.

        The <SegmentTemplate> element needs to be generated before this element with generateSegmentTemplateElement(Document, String, DeliveryType).

        Parameters:
        doc - the Document on which the <SegmentTimeline> element will be appended
        Throws:
        CreationException

      • getInitializationResponse

        @Nonnull
public static Response getInitializationResponse​(@Nonnull
                                                 java.lang.String baseStreamingUrl,
                                                 @Nonnull
                                                 ItagItem itagItem,
                                                 DeliveryType deliveryType)
                                          throws CreationException
        Get the "initialization" response of a stream.
        This method fetches, for OTF streams and for post-live-DVR streams:
        • the base URL of the stream, to which are appended SQ_0 and RN_0 parameters, with a POS request for streaming URLs from WEB, TVHTML5, WEB_EMBEDDED_PLAYER, ANDROID and IOS clients;
        • for streaming URLs from HTML5 clients, the ALR_YES param is also added.
        Parameters:
        baseStreamingUrl - the base URL of the stream, which must not be null
        itagItem - the ItagItem of stream, which must not be null
        deliveryType - the DeliveryType of the stream
        Returns:
        the "initialization" response, without redirections on the network on which the request(s) is/are made
        Throws:
        CreationException
